donations.donation_comment: God bless you for standing up for freedom and Canadians.  What you started is going all around the world and I am so proud of our Canadian Truckers.  What everyone should realize is that this is not just about vaccines but also about Klaus Schwab and the great reset.  The globalists have taken over the Canadian Government and we must do all that we can to stop this for us and our children.

Thank You Truckers for your Brave fight for freedom in the face of International Tyranny! I hope America follows your example. May the hand of God be with you in this fight. I send this from NY state USA which has the feeling of occupied France under the NAZIS complete with a Stassi to remind you to wear your Mask (arm band) the symbol of their Loyalty.

Thanks for fighting for all of our freedoms.  It takes courage and conviction. The politicians and bureaucrats are using this to grab power and take rights from people that they haven’t even given up themselves and never will. They don’t realize how much
Power we “little people” can have. I’m praying that you are successful for all of us and that they don’t chose to escalate this.

You are the hope of the world!
Keep holding the Line Brothers and Sisters - We love you so much!!!
God Bless you.  You are fighting for us all.

Thank you for standing up for all Canadians.  We have a right right to make our own medical choices.  We have a right to have scienctific discussion and discussion in general.  We have a right not to be manipulated by by big media in service of a false narrative.  We do not need corporations controlling our government and academia.  Government and public health have failed us all.  Keep on truckin

I absolutely love the way that you and truckers are standing up to the gestapo Canadian government. You can count on me to continue the fight against tyranny and oppressively  government policies.
I AM WITH YOU!!!

JIM HAMMETT
1160 NW OVERLOOK DRIVE
Corvallis, OREGON 97330
THANK YOU TRUCKERS, FARMERS, RANCHERS, NURSES, and everyone standing up against this violation of our basic rights and freedoms.  We are Canadian!!!!!
We are praying for you and much love and thanks!
